title: Count right angle triangles
text: You are given n points in a 2D plane. You are asked these an inherently simple questions about them.You  have to find out number of right angle triangles (having base and height parallel to axis) with the property that length of base and height is same.InputFirst Line will n: number of points. (n ≤ 105).For next n lines  each line will contain two integers x and y.  (-108≤ x, y ≤ 108).OutputYou have to output a single line containing the answer to question.ExampleInput:50 01 02 00 10 2Output:2
